verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Trust in the Lord with all of your heart; lean not on your own understanding.
In all of your ways acknowledge Him and He will make your path straight.
Don't worry about tomorrow; He's got it under control.
Just trust in the Lord with all of your heart and He will carry you through.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, sometimes it gets so tough
to keep my eyes on you when things are going rough.
But then I turn my eyes up to the sky and I hear Your voice;
It says to me:
